General.Name: Digiwin Software Co Ltd
General.Description: Digiwin Software Co.,Ltd. provides industry-specific software solutions in Mainland China and internationally. It offers industrial software products and solutions; digital and networked and intelligent comprehensive solutions; and consulting implementation services for manufacturing and distribution companies. The company also provides services for enterprises in product planning, research and development, technology, and production; and digital management services for enterprises. In addition, it offers industrial software solutions for production control and AIoT businesses. Digiwin Software Co.,Ltd. was founded in 1982 and is based in Shanghai, China.
General.Address: No.7, Greenland Central Plaza, Shanghai, China, 200072
